actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to allow individuals a deduction for expenses incurred in contiguous less-developed countries.

summary.text: Authorizes a tax deduction, under the Internal Revenue Code, for amounts paid in any contiguous less-developed country. Limits such deduction to $400 for any taxable year and $200 during any week. Reduces the deduction by five percent of the excess of the taxpayer's adjusted gross income over $15,000. Defines the terms used in this Act.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to allow individuals a deduction for expenses incurred in contiguous less-developed countries.
